Class IBrep

java.lang.Object
  igeo.IObject
      igeo.IGeometry
          igeo.IBrep
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITransformable
Direct Known Subclasses:
IBox
public class IBrep
extends IGeometry
implements ITransformable

Class BRep (Boundary Representation) of IObject. Implementation of BRep is not complete yet. To be completed later.

Author:
Satoru Sugihara
